Header: Deputy US Ambassador calls on Thondaman
Content: Deputy US Ambassador in Sri Lanka Martin T. Kelly called on leader of the Ceylon Workersâ€™ Congress Parliamentarian Arumugam Thondaman in Nuwara Eliya. According to our reporters, they have discussed about current political situation, the upcoming Presidential election and issues of the estate sector people. The discussion has lasted more than one hour. The meeting was also attended by Provincial Councilor of the Uva Province, Sendil Thondaman and several other political figures.
